members.name: Use plain JavaScript
members.description: We love JavaScript. Its a totally friendly language. All templating languages grow to be Turing-complete. Just cut out the middle-man, and use JS!

members.name: Fast development time
members.description: Dont waste time and attention figuring out arcane new syntax because elegance — or how to preprocess your data so it will actually render right.

members.name: Simple syntax
members.description: JavaScript code in simple, straightforward scriptlet tags. Just write JavaScript that emits the HTML you want, and get the job done!

members.name: Use plain JavaScript
members.description: We love JavaScript. Its a totally friendly language. All templating languages grow to be Turing-complete. Just cut out the middle-man, and use JS!

members.name: Fast development time
members.description: Dont waste time and attention figuring out arcane new syntax because elegance — or how to preprocess your data so it will actually render right.

members.name: Simple syntax
members.description: JavaScript code in simple, straightforward scriptlet tags. Just write JavaScript that emits the HTML you want, and get the job done!

members.name: Speedy execution
members.description: We all know how fast V8 and the other JavaScript runtimes have gotten. EJS caches the intermediate JS functions for fast execution.

members.name: Easy debugging
members.description: Its easy to debug EJS errors: your errors are plain JavaScript exceptions, with template line-numbers included.

members.name: Active development
members.description: EJS has a large community of active users, and the library is under active development. Were happy to answer your questions or give you help.
